????:::

The pod opened and a beutyful femme left it. Her metallik skin mixed 
blue and silver. She has a silver, oval face, her head was wearing a 
bejewelled  herlmet. Her lips were tin and delicates. Her eyes were 
blue and with an exotic spark. She seemed to be delicate and strong 
at time. From hers back emerge two deep blue bat-like wings and three 
dragon's head.

The femme looked around.
